mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_message where receiver = #{user_email} and open_date is null
select * from tbl_message where receiver = #{user_email} order by open_date nulls first, send_date desc
select * from tbl_message where sender = #{user_email} order by send_date desc
mapper.update: update tbl_message set open_date = sysdate where message_num = #{message_num}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_message (message_num, receiver, sender, message_text) values (seq_message.nextval, #{receiver}, #{sender}, #{message_text})
